phrases: Wow, it is beautiful!
So this is Gallia's capital, Lutis.
This is where Tabitha is from.
Are you really sure we can ask you to repair the ship?
I think I have used up my luck as a researcher.
I mean, I get to see another barbarian country.
If I knew this was going to happen,
I would have insisted on following Lord Bidalsha.
Do not sigh like that.
Think of it as our honeymoon and enjoy it.
Where the heck did that Saito go?
Hey!
Oh, Sait
Wait up, you two!
Tiffa said you would have trouble without this.
Right, Tiffa?
Oh, thank you.
What are you so mad about?
What is with all the Tiffa, Tiffa stuff?
I was your master first!
I see, so you are Tiffa's rival.
Rival?
I am surprised you were able to win with those.
S-Saito prefers them small!
Is that so?
Were not you happily touching her breasts?
What did you say?
What does that mean?!
Th-That is...
What?!
Lady Charlotte!
I am so relieved you are safe.
Start preparing the coronation ceremony right away.
So she decided...
Tabitha's Coronation
We need more stuffing here.
That is why I told you to lay eggs.
Charlotte.
Mother...
So you made the decision.
Thank you.
I still cannot believe it.
Tabitha is going to be a queen soon.
I bet Miss Tabitha will be quite pretty
at the coronation ceremony.
But we cannot let our guard down.
This is the last chance to lay eggs!
That is what that rhyme dragon will say,
and try to get in our way.
Tabitha is too busy preparing for that.
You never know.
There might be a hidden room here.
Like here, or here!
Oh no!
Miss Valliere!
What?
She might be more of a danger than Miss Tabitha.
I mean, Miss Westwood is also Saito's master now.
The second!
I was his master first.
The order does not matter.
What matters is what Saito thinks.
O-Of course he is going to choose me...
What?!
What is that stupid dog doing?!
Uh, a little higher.
Higher?
Even higher.
But that is...
Now it is lower...
Lower?
Okay, now I will...
Louise?!
Do tell, what are you doing?!
Ow, ow, ow!
What the hell?
I was just trying to get the bug out.
A bug?
Please, try to think of a more plausible lie.
Yes, really.
Like a bug would
oh so conveniently get into her clothes.
See, I told you.
I am glad that is solved, Tiffa.
I-I am sorry...
It is fine.
This is what I am here for.
You should depend on me more.
I am your familiar after all.
Okay.
Then please excuse me.
Oh, you are going to the guest house, right?
I will go with you.
Those guys were on my mind, too.
I was thinking that they might feel a bit lost...
You are so kind, Tiffa.
Would not it be best to make sure
it is clear who the real master is?
Of course.
Explore the palace?
Yes.
Do not you want to see
the other buildings now that we are here?
I will pass.
Seeing more jail-like buildings would just be depressing.
I knew you would say that.
Then I will go by myself.
Oh, you guys are...
I am captain of the Order of the Undine Knights,
Guiche de Gramont.
I-I am Malicorne de Grandple.
This is perfect.
Could I ask you to show me around the palace?
I am sorry, but we cannot let you leave this place.
But the girl with the blue hair said I was free to do what I want.
I do not know what Tabitha said...
But we cannot have you because any commotion right now.
Commotion?
If anybody found out that they are hiding elves here,
you can forget about the coronation.
That is what they mean.
I am glad you understand.
Please stay here quietly then.
With you as our guards, huh?
Come on, just a tiny bit.
I will be right back.
No, no.
Please go back.
I said no!
I am so sorry!
How dare you touch Lukshana!
I-I thought I was going to die...
What are you doing?
You elves are truly uncivilized.
Uncivilized?
That is the ultimate insult, coming from a barbarian!
Hey, guys!
Do you need anythi
Whoa, what are you doing?!
This barbarian manhandled Lukshana.
I-I did not!
You are the one who started it!
C'mon, who cares?
Just put that away and let us get along, okay?
You say get along, but you know...
No way, not with someone who looks down on others like that.
He is just putting up a tough front
because he is in a totally foreign place.
You can relate, right?
I think they would understand if they would just talk...
Whoa, wh-what is this?
I am choosing what to wear to the dance.
Tabitha provided me with these.
Now that you mention it,
I guess there is a dance after the coronation ceremony.
Hey, what about this one?
I think that is more for girls with a bigger chest, like Tiffa.
No, I mean...
Uh, um...
I think this is better for you, Louise.
Then I will try it on, so help me!
W-Wait...
Louise...
Help me with this.
M-Me?
Are you saying you will not listen to your master?
Are not you my familiar?!
A-All right...
Ah, that tickles.
I am sorry.
Do not forget to tie the ribbon.
G-Got it.
Y-You can touch them if you want.
What?
Really?!
If it is just a little bit.
Jeez, I said just a little bit.
That is impossible, Louise.
Saito, can I ask you something?
I am the only master for you, right?
Of c
Please help me, Saito!
Tiffa?
What is wrong, Tiffa?
I am having trouble putting this on.
Is it all right to depend on you for things like this, too?
YOU-Uh...
I will do it!
These things should be done by girls!
Huh?
It seems to be a bit tight...
Got it!
D-Do not look!
By tomorrow, Tabitha will be a queen.
It is amazing, she will be of the same standing as Lady Henrietta.
Speaking of, I heard she just arrived.
Help!
Lukshana is gone!
Gone?
She said she was going to take a bath,
but since she was taking so long, I went in to check
and she was gone.
Then...
She ran away?!
What are you doing?
Go find her already!
This has been irking me since before,
but what is with your tone?
Is that how you ask people for favors?
Can it!
Is not this what you were guarding us for?!
We are not standing guard for you, we are doing it for Tabitha!
What did you say?!
You two, do not start this...
Hey, did you hear?
His Holiness has arrived.
His Holiness?
You mean from Romalia?
This is bad.
If this gets out...
Let us find Lukshana before it is too late!
What?
Lukshana is missing?
She did not come here, then?
No...
Maybe she got captured by barbarians and is being abused...
She is got her wits together, so there is no need to worry.
I want to help look for her, but the queen summoned me.
Saito, let us go!
I am coming.
I am sorry, I will see you later.
Let us try another place.
I will find her, no matter what!
It is primitive, but very pretty.
I would like to congratulate you on your coronation, Queen Charlotte.
Thank you very much.
Saito and Miss Westwood, I am relieved you are safe.
Normally, we should have come to rescue you, but...
Oh, it was fine.
But I am surprised you were able to
rescue those two from those unknown lands.
About that...
When I came to, I was casting a spell...
You can use a World Door...
World Door?
It is a Void spell that can connect two distant places.
Louise, so you learned a new spell.
I actually almost ran out of energy,
but when I grabbed Saito's hands,
the window got bigger.
Got bigger?
Does that mean the power of the spell got stronger?
I believe so.
But Gandalfr should not have that kind of power...
What is it?
I think this has something to do with it.
That is...
Apparently I have become Tiffa's familiar as well.
Is that even possible?
One body can house multiple familiar powers, my lord?
I have never heard of it.
But the fact that LIfPrasir is here...
LIf... What?
LIfPrasir is someone who has the ability to amplify the Void powers.
That is what caused the surge of power in Miss Valliere.
So that is why...
Joseph's familiar was the Mind of God, Mioznitnirn.
Then, there is the Left Hand of God, Gandalfr.
The Right Hand of God, Windalfr.
And the Heart of God, LIfPrasir.
Four familiars to fight alongside the four Void Mages.
It is said that the four and four exist to join
their powers in order to save Halkeginia from danger.
As we have not found Joseph's successor,
the four and four are currently incomplete.
Even if Halkeginia were to face a crisis,
as long as we have LIfPrasir,
we can amplify our powers many times.
LIfPrasir is wonderful news for us.
I have that kind of power?
So I guess it is basically a booster.
So using this power,
your Explosion would get much stronger, right?
I suppose...
This is all thanks to Tiffa...
Maybe this means that me binding
the contract with Saito had its use...
Then, perhaps there was a point to my feelings, too...
Ah, there you are.
We were looking for you.
We were thinking of going to Tabitha's room.
Tonight's the last night, we wanted to spend it with her.
That sounds good.
I am in.
Tiffa, you will come too, right?
Y-Yes.
I will come, too.
Nope.
No boys allowed.
All right, let us go.
Do not get too carried away!
We know!
I bet Tabitha will be surprised when all of us suddenly show up.
Th-That is...
She is got blond hair like you,
and breasts like you...
Guiche, I cannot believe you!
Ow, ow, ow, M-Montmorency!
I let you out of my sight for one second and this happens!
It is not what you think, Montmorency!
I am actually looking for someone.
Right now
I do not want to hear your excuses!
You really never learn!
Wait, Montmorency!
You deserve that.
Why will not you listen to me?
We are the same...
I realized that elves and
barbarians are the same when it comes to women.
You have it quite rough, too.
What the hell is he thinking?
When he has someone like me?!
Jeez!
You guys are just like us.
Lukshana?!
You were not in the guest house?
I simply had to see the palace.
I did not think it would lead to such a ruckus.
So, what Guiche said back there...
Wait,
was he looking for you?!
Looks like it.
Oh no, I thought...
It is his fault for not being clear.
That is often why Ari and I fight as well.
It looks like we will get along quite well.
What is all this noise?
Did something happen?
I am not going to look for Lukshana any more!
She always does what she wants,
but if I dare to voice my opinion,
she immediately threatens to not marry me!
Of course she knows that I cannot say anything then!
Exactly!
If I even talk to another girl,
she screams that I am cheating on her!
Women are so annoying!
It looks like those two are best buddies all of a sudden.
Well, I am just glad they get along now.
But I wonder where Lukshana is.
Saito!
Malicorne!
Huh?
Lukshana?
Please tell Ari that Lukshana will stay over here tonight.
Thanks!
Lukshana and Montmorency, too?
When did that happen?
I told you.
They will understand if they just talk.
I, Charlotte Helene Orleans,
hereby proclaim that I will be Queen of Gallia.
My Queen!
A new queen has been born!
Tabitha is queen, huh?
So, about that thing we discussed the other day...
What was it?
About me being your only master.
That does not matter.
It does not matter?!
I mean that master and all that does not matter.
The only one I love is you, Louise.
Saito...
Hurry up or you will be late.
But...
Wait, Saito!
I have not finished putting on my dress!
Man, where did he go?
Your Highness, why did not you tell Saito about it?
About LIfPrasir?
Yes.
Indeed, it amplifies the power of the Void,
but the energy of his soul can never be
replenished once it is used.
If he keeps using it, Saito will...
Using the power of LIfPrasir is
essentially shaving off a part of his life.
When he runs out of energy, he will die.
But telling him this would only
strike unnecessary fear into his heart.
When the time comes that that power is truly needed,
he will not be able to face the danger threatening the world.
Die?
What do they mean?
The power of LIfPrasir that Saito has gained...
I never expected that the time
it is truly needed would come so soon.
Next time: The Awakening of Calamity.
Saito, please, you cannot die!
The Awakening of Calamity
